snippet.title: Castlevania Aria of Sorrow : Reprise 0.5a release!
snippet.description:
Reprise is a roguelike mod for Aria of Sorrow which allows for endless randomized gameplay, along with extensive rebalancing and new features! Rooms, enemies, items, and shop are randomized, along with custom content and modifications.

Mod still active in development, join the discord to stay up to date and give feedback at https://discord.gg/PytA9rr6nz
Romhacking forum thread: https://www.romhacking.net/forum/index.php?topic=35962.0
Version in this video: 0.5a

Some highlights on this version:
* Julius Mode! Hold the L button while hitting start on the name entry screen for Julius mode.
* New Room modifiers
* XP Containers randomly hidden in the walls.
* New equipment/soul effects, (e.g. spears can pierce defense, hammers do double damage if it will kill, Max HP/MP can be modified. Full list in the readme.txt)
* Additional custom balance changes
* Fixes, room generation changes, and other minor changes

00:00  Soma 
1:42 Final Strike effect
2:10 Soma cont.
2:43 Room Modifier
3:45 Soma cont.
6:25 Book of Return
6:56 Soma cont.
08:48 Hidden containers in walls
09:27 Soma cont.
11:08 Spear Pierce effect
11:48  Soma cont.
1:05:05 Julius
1:11:30 Extra Stuff
